The video keeps in and out of focus.  Like the compression is changing, going from crystal to blurry on and off every few seconds.  Very subtle, but really obnoxious.   

Anyone else seeing this?

Never mind.  The "default" aspect ratio for VLC player was doing it.  Changing it to 2.21:1 fixed the issue.  

 cycles through the available ratios in VLC, at least on my machine.  Btw.
